TypeSignature.Value: .class public interface auto ansi abstract IInputSessionChannel implements class System.ServiceModel.Channels.IChannel, class System.ServiceModel.Channels.IInputChannel, class System.ServiceModel.Channels.ISessionChannel`1<class System.ServiceModel.Channels.IInputSession>, class System.ServiceModel.ICommunicationObject

Docs.summary: Defines the interface that associates an input channel with a session.

remarks.format:
## Remarks The <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.IInputSessionChannel> interface indicates that an <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.IInputChannel> implements <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.IInputSession> semantics.
The <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.IInputSession> associated with an <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.IInputSessionChannel> can be retrieved through the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.ISessionChannel%601.Session%2A> property.
